ComicInfo.Summary: Stormwatch is running a blockade on the island state of Gamorra when Battalion discovers that three members of Stormwatch Prime, members he believed to be long dead, have been detained and tortured on the island for years. Despite explicit orders by Weatherman One not to interfere, Battalion, Fuji and Hellstrike decide to mount a rescue and run up against Deathtrap and his Mercs.
